description: Change of use of first and second floors (Class E) to provide two residential units (Class C3), infill extension to second floor former lightwell, cycle storage in rear yard, provision of second floor balcony at rear and use of existing flat roof at rear for first floor roof terrace.
decision_conditions:
For the avoidance of doubt the Drawing(s) No(s) to which this decision refers are as follows:- 
298_POD_XX_XX_DR_A_STAGE3_TPE_0001_S0 Rev 01, 298_POD_XX_XX_DR_A_STAGE3_TPE_1000_S1 Rev 02, 298_POD_XX_XX_DR_A_STAGE3_TPE_1001_S1 Rev 02, 298_POD_XX_XX_DR_A_STAGE3_TPE_2001_S1 Rev 02, 298_POD_XX_XX_DR_A_STAGE3_TPE_3001_S1 Rev 02, 298_POD_XX_XX_DR_A_STAGE3_TPE_3002_S1 Rev 02, 298_POD_XX_XX_DR_A_STAGE3_TPP_0001_S1 Rev 01, 298_POD_XX_XX_DR_A_STAGE3_TPP_0002_S1 Rev 01, 298_POD_XX_XX_DR_A_STAGE3_TPP_1000_S1 Rev 02, 298_POD_XX_XX_DR_A_STAGE3_TPP_1001_S1 Rev 02, 298_POD_XX_XX_DR_A_STAGE3_TPP_2001_S1 Rev 02, 298_POD_XX_XX_DR_A_STAGE3_TPP_3001_S1 Rev 02 & 298_POD_XX_XX_DR_A_STAGE3_TPP_3002_S1 Rev 02 received on 17 Apr 2025.
